title: Login issue
description: User unable to log in with valid credentials. The login page keeps refreshing without showing any error message.

title: Payment failure
description: Transaction declined during checkout. Customer reported that the payment gateway shows an error despite sufficient balance.

title: Slow website
description: Website takes too long to load on mobile devices, especially on 4G connections. The issue seems consistent across different browsers.

title: Profile update error
description: Customer unable to update phone number in profile. The update form reloads but the information remains unchanged.

title: Order not received
description: Customer did not receive the order placed last week. Tracking details show 'in transit' but no further updates are available.

title: Refund request
description: Customer requested refund for duplicate payment. The system shows two transactions for the same order ID.

title: App crash
description: Mobile app crashes after login on Android devices. The issue occurs mostly on Android 12 and above.

title: Email not delivered
description: Customer not receiving confirmation emails after order placement. Checked spam folder but emails are missing.

title: UI alignment issue
description: Buttons not aligned properly on the homepage. On smaller screens the layout breaks and overlaps with text.

title: Account locked
description: Customer account locked after multiple failed attempts. Password reset link also not working.

title: Subscription issue
description: Monthly subscription not renewed automatically despite active payment method. Customer had to renew manually.

title: Wrong item delivered
description: Customer received a different item instead of the ordered product. The invoice shows correct item but delivery mismatched.
